title: How to Make Pizza Burritos

steps.headline: Lay a burrito tortilla onto a clean surface.
Pick your favorite pizza ingredients.
steps.description: After you've picked the ingredients, cut them into standard pizza topping sizes. Then put them on the burrito tortilla.

steps.headline: Roll up the burrito tortilla.
steps.description: Do this in just the same way as you'd wrap a standard burrito. Place on a baking sheet or tray, ready for baking.

steps.headline: Bake the burrito in the oven at 350ºF/180ºC.
steps.description: Bake the pizza burrito with the contents inside for as long as you like and as hot as you like, or just until the cheese is melted. This will usually take about 7-10 minutes.

steps.headline: Place the burrito tortilla down flat.
Add pizza sauce to the middle of the tortilla.
steps.description: Spread it around with the back of a spoon or a butter knife. Spread to about 7.5cm/3 inches away from the edge of the circle.

steps.headline: Add the pizza ingredients in layers.
Add seasoning.
steps.description: Sprinkle the top with the Italian seasoning and garlic powder.

steps.headline: Fold the burrito as usual.
steps.description: Fold in two sides, then roll up from the unfolded side.

steps.headline: Place the pizza burrito in a panini press, under a grill or in a pan on the stove.
steps.description: Cook until each side browns, turning over midway.

text: Simple Pizza Burrito Lay a burrito tortilla onto a clean surface.  Pick your favorite pizza ingredients. After you've picked the ingredients, cut them into standard pizza topping sizes. Then put them on the burrito tortilla. Roll up the burrito tortilla. Do this in just the same way as you'd wrap a standard burrito. Place on a baking sheet or tray, ready for baking. Bake the burrito in the oven at 350ºF/180ºC. Bake the pizza burrito with the contents inside for as long as you like and as hot as you like, or just until the cheese is melted. This will usually take about 7-10 minutes. Enjoy the burrito.  Finished.  Grilled Pizza Burrito Place the burrito tortilla down flat.  Add pizza sauce to the middle of the tortilla. Spread it around with the back of a spoon or a butter knife. Spread to about 7.5cm/3 inches away from the edge of the circle. Add the pizza ingredients in layers. Top with the shredded cheese. Add seasoning. Sprinkle the top with the Italian seasoning and garlic powder. Fold the burrito as usual. Fold in two sides, then roll up from the unfolded side. Place the pizza burrito in a panini press, under a grill or in a pan on the stove. Cook until each side browns, turning over midway. Remove from the heat. Serve immediately.
sentences: Simple Pizza Burrito Lay a burrito tortilla onto a clean surface.
Pick your favorite pizza ingredients.
After you've picked the ingredients, cut them into standard pizza topping sizes.
Then put them on the burrito tortilla.
Roll up the burrito tortilla.
Do this in just the same way as you'd wrap a standard burrito.
Place on a baking sheet or tray, ready for baking.
Bake the burrito in the oven at 350ºF/180ºC.
Bake the pizza burrito with the contents inside for as long as you like and as hot as you like, or just until the cheese is melted.
This will usually take about 7-10 minutes.
Enjoy the burrito.
Finished.
Grilled Pizza Burrito Place the burrito tortilla down flat.
Add pizza sauce to the middle of the tortilla.
Spread it around with the back of a spoon or a butter knife.
Spread to about 7.5cm/3 inches away from the edge of the circle.
Add the pizza ingredients in layers.
Top with the shredded cheese.
Add seasoning.
Sprinkle the top with the Italian seasoning and garlic powder.
Fold the burrito as usual.
Fold in two sides, then roll up from the unfolded side.
Place the pizza burrito in a panini press, under a grill or in a pan on the stove.
Cook until each side browns, turning over midway.
Remove from the heat.
Serve immediately.
